top.title: US Senate passes funding bill as historic shutdown nears likely end
top.summary: It will need to be approved by the House and then signed into law by the president before the government can reopen.

top.title: 'There was blood everywhere': Delhi residents recount horror of huge car explosion
top.summary: Eyewitnesses describe what they saw after the blast near the Red Fort in the Indian capital.

top.title: Suicide bombing in Islamabad kills 12, says Pakistan's interior minister
top.summary: Mohsin Naqvi says the bomber tried to gain entry to a court complex but was unable to get inside.

top.title: Cryptoqueen who fled China for London mansion to be sentenced over £5bn Bitcoin stash
top.summary: Qian Zhimin bought cryptocurrency using funds stolen from thousands of Chinese pensioners, say police.

top.title: Battle over Chinese chip maker rocks global car industry
top.summary: In an extraordinary move, the Dutch government seized control of Nexperia, triggering anger in Beijing.

top.title: A jailed hacking kingpin reveals all about the gang that left a trail of destruction
top.summary: One of the world's most prominent cyber-criminals speaks to the BBC in an exclusive interview.
